name: Twin Aces
description:
Twin Aces is a two player versus dogfighting game; you will face big waves of enemies until it comes to the big showdown between booth players.

Audio by John Fio.

Controls:

Player 1:

A/D: Pitch/Rotate

Space: Fire Missiles

Player 2:

Left Arrow/Right Arrow: Pitch/Rotate

Enter: Fire Missile
